text: Milton Keynes & District Reform Synagogue, also known as Beit Echud, is a Reform Jewish community on Hainault Avenue in Milton Keynes, Buckinghamshire, England. Its current synagogue building was opened in 2002. The community was founded in 1978 and is affiliated to the Movement for Reform Judaism. It publishes a members' newsletter, Listen. ==See also== * List of Jewish communities in the United Kingdom * List of former synagogues in the United Kingdom * Movement for Reform Judaism ==References== == External links == * Category:Buildings and structures in Milton Keynes Category:Reform synagogues in the United Kingdom
title: Milton Keynes & District Reform Synagogue
